          <script id="CartDropdown_AjaxTemplate" type="text/x-jquery-tmpl">
           &lt;div class="item" id="${CartProductId}_CartDropdown_productItem"&gt;
        &lt;div class="title-wide  "&gt;
            ${Title}
            {{if Details2 != undefined &amp;&amp; DetailsSub == undefined}}
                &lt;br/&gt;${Details2}
            {{/if}}            
            {{if Details != "" }}
                &lt;div&gt;
                    ${Details}
                    {{if DetailsSub != undefined}}
                        ${DetailsSub}
                    {{/if}}
                &lt;/div&gt;
            {{/if}}
            {{if IsPassInsuranceApplicable}}
                {{if IsPassInsuranceAccepted}}
                    &lt;input type="checkbox" id="${CartProductId}_chkPassInsurance_UpdateCartProduct" checked="checked" /&gt; Pass Insurance (${PassInsuranceAmount})
                {{else}}
                    &lt;input type="checkbox" id="${CartProductId}_chkPassInsurance_UpdateCartProduct" /&gt; Pass Insurance (declined)
                {{/if}}
            {{/if}}
        &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;div class=' 
             {{if !Promotion || !Promotion.DiscountAmount || Promotion.DiscountAmount * 1 == 0}}
                    price
                {{else}}
                    price discountedPrice
                {{/if}}
            '&gt;
            &lt;div class="remove"
                 data-sku="${OmnitureId}" 
                 data-price="${NumericPrice}"
                data-quantity="${Quantity}"&gt;
                &lt;img src="/Content/component-themes/checkout/images/icon-delete.png" alt="X" /&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt; 
            ${Price}       
        &lt;/div&gt;
             
        {{if Promotion &amp;&amp; Promotion.IsApplied }}        
            &lt;div class="clearfix"&gt;
                &lt;div class="promoCode"&gt;
                    Promo Code Applied: 
                    &lt;span class="promoName"&gt;${Promotion.PromotionCode}&lt;/span&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;    
                 {{if Promotion.DiscountAmount &gt; 0 }}&lt;span class="promoPrice"&gt;$${CurrencyFormatted(Promotion.AjustedPrice)}&lt;/span&gt;{{/if}}         
            &lt;/div&gt;
        {{/if}}

        &lt;input type="hidden" id="${CartProductId}_CartDropdown_hdnCartProductId" value="${CartProductId}" /&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
